import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getHists } from "../redux/selectors"; const Balance = ({ newhist }) => (

YOUR BALANCE

{'$ ' + newhist.map(item => parseFloat(item.amount)).reduce((acc, cur) => acc + cur, 0)}

INCOME

{newhist .map(item =>parseFloat(item.amount)) .filter(amount => amount > 0) .reduce((acc, cur) => acc + cur, 0)}

EXPENSE

{newhist .map(item => parseFloat(item.amount)) .filter(amount => amount < 0) .reduce((acc, cur) => acc + cur, 0)}

); export default connect(state => ({ newhist : getHists(state) }))(Balance);
